__e: A perfectly dreadful century, I might add, highlighted by wars, women's lib and the holocaust:
Admiral, I can't squeeze it out of him.
Admiral, I doubt you brought us all this way just for a debriefing.
I may be wearing the uniform of a commander, but I am in fact an admiral of the fleet.
Why, of course I do, madame. I want to be grand admiral of France.
And maybe I want you to see that you are still needed here... no matter what some idiot Starfleet admiral might think.
